title: Valhalla 13 - The Ballad of Baldur
description:
And as amazing as it sounds, the Valhalla project is finally back on track. After waiting since 2012 for JJ to finish, then having Alice do Valhalla 12, and then waiting 2 more years on relieta, I finally found a new retexter, so a big thanks to Chevalley for retexting this album, and hopefully the last 2 too :)


Being surrounded only by death can be depressing at times. Therefore the Goddess of Death, Hel, wants Loki to help her invigorate the Realm of Death. And when he refuses, she threatens him with a terrible punishment: She will make the other gods believe that Loki is going to kill Baldur! 

Loki works very hard to make sure that absolutely nothing happens to Baldur - or to himself. But in doing so, he starts the exact same chain of events that he is trying to avoid...

[img]https://extraimago.com/images/2016/06/18/Valhalla13-BalladofBaldur-26.jpg[/img][img]https://extraimago.com/images/2016/06/19/Valhalla13-BalladofBaldur-39.jpg[/img]
